sn54.11:2.5: Given the consistency of this formula, it seems that the variations in the Buddha’s own meditation are meaningful and should be reflected in translation. These are the omission of “va” here; the omission of “vā” below; and the omission of “sikkhati”.
sn54.11:3.2: That Tathāgata here means any arahant is shown in the next sutta.
